name: Catalyst (itch) (AlekaiXD)
description:
(Cat)alyst is a story/puzzle game where you adventure through the skies as a magical cat. As you watch below the vast skies the sky stares back. You must find your way back home as you teleport between floating islands. Push the obstacles in the way and solve problems on the path. For the full experience we recommend that you stop and listen to the narrations.

Controls:

Dash (used to jump over ledges): Shift

Movement: WASD

Grab/Ungrab: Space

Interact: E

Credits:

Aleksi Pirttinen - Lead designer and programmer

Lukas Pietilä - Song writer and level designer

Elmo Malinen - Artist and lead animator

Pinja Pulkkinen - Lead artist
